CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Referral_Partnership_Churned_At__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK( Became_a_Reseller_Partner_Date__c)) ,Referral_Partnership_Churned_At__c - Became_a_Reseller_Partner_Date__c, IF(NOT(ISBLANK( First_Reseller_Contraction_At__c )), Now() - First_Reseller_Contraction_At__c , null) )
CustomField.label: Reseller Partner Days
